Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Bn-AFP1 (B. napus antifungal peptide 1; natural AMPs; defensins; BWQ, XXQ, UCSS1a; plants)

Literature Information.Literature: Chemical modification: N-terminus is pyroglutamate.Activity: low salt medium A: active against A. brassicola (IC50 0.6 ug/ml), B. cinerea (IC50 2 ug/ml), F. culmorum (IC50 2.8 ug/ml), F. oxysporum f.sp. lycopersici (IC50 1.3 ug/ml), P. oryzae (IC50 0.35 ug/ml), and V. dahliae (IC50 1.2 ug/ml). activity and Seq updated 2/2023.
Literature Information.Author: Terras FR, Torrekens S, Van Leuven F, Osborn RW, Vanderleyden J, Cammue BP, Broekaert WF.1993
Literature Information.Title: A new family of basic cysteine-rich plant antifungal proteins from Brassicaceae species
